Sentencas: The performance of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) as well as their lifetime are strongly dependent on electrode microstructure.
Titulo: Microstructure Degradation of LSM/YSZ Cathodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Aged in Stack after Long Operation Time

Sentencas: In this paper the effects of long exposure time (up to 20 000 h) under realistic operation conditions (T = 850 degrees C, J = 190-250 mA.cm(-2)) in the microstructural degradation are investigated for porous Lanthanum Strontium Manganite (LSM)/Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia (YSZ) cathodes in order to understand the microstructural evolution in SOFC cermet cathodes.
Titulo: Microstructure Degradation of LSM/YSZ Cathodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Aged in Stack after Long Operation Time

Sentencas: Data acquired from high resolution and optimized 3D imaging technique Focused Ion Beam (FIB)/Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) was used in the quantification of various cathode structures aged during different operating times (2 500 h, 15 000 h and 20 000 h).
Titulo: Microstructure Degradation of LSM/YSZ Cathodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Aged in Stack after Long Operation Time

Sentencas: The methodologies of tomography enable a precise quantification of particle grain growth, connectivity, tortuosity factor and triple phase boundary length (TPBL).
Titulo: Microstructure Degradation of LSM/YSZ Cathodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Aged in Stack after Long Operation Time

Sentencas: Statistically no significant 3D microstructural changes were observed in the cathode by increasing the operating time.
Titulo: Microstructure Degradation of LSM/YSZ Cathodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Aged in Stack after Long Operation Time

Sentencas: The quantitative results from the FIB/SEM tomography were combined with additional semi quantitative measurements done by X-ray fluorescence (XRF) in order to study the chrome poisoning in the cathodes.
Titulo: Microstructure Degradation of LSM/YSZ Cathodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Aged in Stack after Long Operation Time

Sentencas: Both techniques led to a more thorough description of the degradation phenomena in the microstructures of LSM-based cathodes.
Titulo: Microstructure Degradation of LSM/YSZ Cathodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Aged in Stack after Long Operation Time
